page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Most families are similar in some ways but in our area we are surveying differences between 16 families.We gathered most of our information from the caravan park.None of the families had originated from this area.They had all moved into the area within the range of 1 to 30 years.Only one family went to church regurally,the rest only went occasionally.Neraly every family uses some sort of public amenity.The most popular were the bus and the local pub.The highest number in one family was 7,but the most popular number was 4. The number of families with cars was 14.The number of families with telephones was 14.We have come to the conclusion that most people have modern appliances these days.
